title: Midterm Exam
description: This exam is graded by the instructional staff.
grading: This exam is not peer graded.

parts.title: A screen shot (including the URL) of your index.php rejecting an incorrect password showing the developer console that proves you did a POST-Redirect
A screen shot (with URL) of your data.php showing ACCESS DENIED
A screen shot (including the URL) of your data.php with three items in the list
A screen shot (including the URL) of your data.php showing the data validation error message
A screen shot (including the URL) of your data.php showing the success and empty list of items after the Clear All has been done.
